title: Three-Legged Mile Record Falls
excerpt: Despite the record being viewed by the pair as a conversation starter, this record demonstrates a unique ability to problem solve and grow to achieve a goal. A personality trait that is essential to be a competitive runner.
body: LSU Teammates comment on how they're around and competing with people breaking "real" records. This type of record requires a different level of teamwork and coordination, something not commonly seen in track. Breaking a record like this although it may be viewed as "goofy" or not a real record shouldn't be viewed in the same light as a typical track record. It gives extra depth to a field that is usually very solo and a record falling is credited to a single individual rather than a pair, mastering a unique skill.
